justification: The participants evaluated the problem-solving skills using Likert scales, indicating their preference and rating the quality of AI and human responses on problem-solving.
Strategic thinking was assessed with participants using Likert scales, where they judged the strategic thinking quality of AI and human responses.
Participants evaluated decision-making skills using Likert scales, comparing the quality of AI and human responses on making decisions.
Self-efficacy was measured using Bandura's self-efficacy scale, with participants rating the self-efficacy demonstrated in the AI and human responses.
